titleStmt.title: The case of Mr. Hugh Peters, impartially communicated to the vievv and censure of the whole world: written by his own hand.
titleStmt.author: Peters, Hugh, 1598-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Sam. Speed, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Printing-Press in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A⁴ B² .
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the signe of the Printing-Press in St. Pauls Church-yard
